metadata.title: Ship-gathered ground truth for GAK 4 moorings

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries

metadata.description:
Ground truth during deployment and recovery cruises for GAK 4 physical and biological moorings.
An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data for situ calibration of physical and biological sensors on GAK 4 moorings supporting NPMR "Physical Forcing to Marine Productivity: Monitoring Moorings on the Gulf of Alaska Shelf."

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: Unknown

Use constraints: Unknown
